title: Play to win, not to impress.
description: You don’t have to take every fight. If you're low on health, out of utility, or outnumbered, falling back is often the winning move. Don’t let your ego force a peek just to prove something — Valorant is a team game, not a 1v5 simulator.

title: Guns win fights, but utility wins rounds.
description:
Don’t hoard your flashes, smokes, or mollies. You bought your util to use it — not to flex your credits. One well-timed flash or smoke can win a site, save a teammate, or stop a push.

Wasting utility is better than dying with it unused.
Use it early, use it smart, use it together.
